He scored the first two touchdowns of his comeback in a December 2009 rout of the Falcons at the Dome. "I'll never forget this day," an emotional Michael Vick said after the game. I'll never forget coming back to the city of Atlanta. I'll never forget arriving yesterday. I'll never forget seeing a lot of the landmarks I used to see when I lived in this city for six years. I'll never forget shedding a tear on the bus ride over here this morning because I took that route every Sunday to come here and play.
